author: James Freeman
title: Hillary, Jeb and the Trump Kids - WSJ
text:
In this season of hope, some Americans may be praying they don’t have to hear any more about the presidential campaign of 2016. But the conversation continues, and it’s an important one for a political establishment still struggling to understand what happened.
This week former Gov. Jeb Bush (R., Fla.) spoke to a gathering hosted by Yale’s William F. Buckley, Jr. Program, which your humble correspondent serves as a volunteer. Initial reporting on the speech by a student-run campus newspaper sparked an intense reaction on social...
